doc.field: Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
2. Oversize green canvas album (unlabelled) containing photographs numbered 99-200
2. Oversize green canvas album (unlabelled) containing photographs numbered 99-200

This is a canvas bound album made by the Ditta Barbieri, Firenze, identical to the one above. The photos are inserted into corner slips on the recto of each page (not pasted on to the page) and there are two photographs on each page. They are annotated by HA, and he has numbered them more or less consecutively on the page and almost always given the measurements of each work beneath the photograph. Above the photograph he has in some cases supplied the name of the artist or given an attribution. The numbers listed below are those given by HA and correspond to the Reali negative numbers (for their glass negatives, see Series X.
Subseries B: The Interior and the Collection
5 Historic Albums mostly of the interior and works of art at present in the Collection or probably formerly once belonging to it.
